content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide personal advice or diagnosis. However, if you are feeling stressed, incorporating yoga into your routine may be a helpful way to manage it. There are many types of yoga classes available, from beginner to advanced, so you can find one that suits your needs and abilities. Yoga can help you learn relaxation techniques, develop mindfulness skills, and promote overall physical and mental well-being. Additionally, many yoga studios offer online classes, making it easy to start practicing at home. It's always a good idea to consult with your healthcare provider before starting any new exercise routine, and a qualified yoga instructor can help ensure you are practicing safely and effectively.
